s.text: I have read a few of your comments, and you do indeed sound like a thoroughly courteous and sensible person.
I have met a woman whom I am attracted to.
Indeed, it is important that teen-agers should recognize that they are becoming adults, and that they are not in some playground where they have full capabilities and no responsibilities.
It is easy to be attracted to a new woman, whose faults you do not know, who does not know your faults, and who has never asked you to take out the garbage or mow the lawn.
